subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The 14 N.B.A. teams that failed to make the playoffs get to have a little fun tonight when they gather for a shot at the No. 1 pick, most likely Oklahoma's Blake Griffin.
snippet: The 14 N.B.A. teams that failed to make the playoffs get to have a little fun tonight when they gather for a shot at the No. 1 pick, most likely Oklahoma's Blake Griffin.
